enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: In its decision (FCCC/SBSTA/2007/L.20/Add.1/Rev.1), the COP, inter alia : recognizes AR4 as the most authoritative assessment of climate change; urges parties to make use of information contained in AR4 in discussions under all relevant agenda items, including future action, as well as in their national policies; and invites the IPCC to provide timely information to parties.
